ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Twelve: Sheep's Clothing; Chapter Eleven: Into the Wilderness; Chapter Ten: New Wine in Old Bottles; Chapter Nine: Wide the Gate and Broad the Way
ComicInfo.Summary:
Chapter Twelve: Sheep's Clothing: Conrad attacks Vampirella, Adam and Pendragon while under Shroud's control. Conrad fights off the mental control, but as he does he is grabbed and bitten by Chelsea, who is now a vampire.
Chapter Eleven: Into the Wilderness: While the rest of Vampirella's group is sleeping, Shroud uses his influence over Conrad Van Helsing to let in the Etherea, creatures of dreams.
Chapter Ten: New Wine in Old Bottles: Vampirella and her crew take their rescued friends to the Van Helsing estate. But Shroud seems to be fighting for control over Conrad's mind. Meanwhile, Chelsea watches the window in fear, waiting for something.
Chapter Nine: Wide the Gate and Broad the Way: Vampirella, Adam, and Pendragon find and rescue Chelsea. Then Adam's dead and buried father shows up somehow alive. But this all seems to be part of Shroud's plan.
